RelatedSentence: Rush will take on Kansas to see who gets inducted into the 100 percent fan - voted Ultimate Classic Rock Hall of Fame .
Rush will take on Kansas to see who gets inducted into the 100 percent fan - voted Ultimate Classic Rock Hall of Fame .
Every month , our readers will decide which of eight legendary artists will be honored for their contributions to the genre .
Rush had a very difficult time on their way to the finals , winning 51 percent of the vote in both rounds , first against Judas Priest , then against Journey .
Rush had a very difficult time on their way to the finals , winning 51 percent of the vote in both rounds , first against Judas Priest , then against Journey .
Kansas , on the other hand , pulled off two stunning upsets .
In the opening round , they beat Kiss in a close race .
Then in the semifinals , they had a slightly easier time beating AC / DC with 60 percent of the vote .
